snippet: The New York Police Department’s indefensible program of spying on law-abiding citizens is more aggressive than earlier reports had shown.
abstract: Editorial warns New York City Police Department's indefensible program of spying on law-abiding Muslims has turned out to be even more aggressive than earlier reports had shown; holds new information from Associated Press report about program further confirms City Council's approval of law to establish a police inspector general.
lead_paragraph: The New York Police Department’s indefensible program of spying on law-abiding citizens is more aggressive than earlier reports had shown.
